column2: Captain! It's urgent! The beacon has become unstable and is going towards the star fast! Apparently, our researches have screwed up over there.
That's bad. We have to get out of here ASAP. Have they found anything valuable, at least?
Oh yes! They've collected a lot of data and rummaged through the computers over there. We will have to study it in detail and systematize it. I've added the project to the list of tasks.
All right, we'll see. But first, we have to get out of here before someone sees us.
